ThingDef.label: NutriBar
ThingDef.description: A spacer-tech compromise between neolithic pemmican and industrial packaged survival meals, designed specifically to be mass-produced by meal printers.\n\nNutriBars consist of extensively-resequenced foodstuffs, compacted into a handheld form factor. Lightweight, energy dense and inoffensively flavored, one NutriBar is just as filling as a traditional meal and lasts several seasons without refrigeration. Perfect for emergency stockpiles or caravan trips.
